name: UNTERwELT
description:
A game by @Noxlof

Made for Game By Its Cover 2015
#AGBIC (You make a game based on a fake cartridge.)
I choose this one: Cartridge

UNTERwELT is a short story type of game based on my own personal & kinda bizarre mind.

"Walk through the bunkers beneath the surface. Explore & fulfill your job as an engineer! Don't mess around with the Security!"

I had to rush this project as the deadline was coming up & I really wanted to finish this. My apologies for any spelling or grammatical errors (•ө•)♡

EDIT: I updated the game to fix some things (grammatical) aswell as looking over the main code itself.
